data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Surigao del Sur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Surigao del Sur, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Surigao del Sur to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Surigao del Sur to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Surigao del Sur that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Kalagan people might believe through him.
Father, you gave the church of Surigao del Sur, Philippines the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: the state of Surigao del Sur has (about) 66,167 people who know Jesus, 365,919 people who know about him culturally, and 42,915 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Surigao del Sur, Philippines today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

location.name: Surigao del Sur
